articles.author: Malathy Iyer
articles.title: KEM to hire 3 psychologists to counsel its students
articles.description: In a bid to reduce stress in a medical student's life, the BMC-run KEM Hospital in Parel has advertised for three posts of counselling psychologists whose job would be to counsel its students.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: 11 deaths in city in a wk, but cases dip for 2nd day
articles.description: After more than three months, the city recorded 11 Covid-19 deaths in a week.

articles.author: Petlee Peter
articles.title: Four bound for US via Europe denied boarding
articles.description: Not having Schengen visa for transit through Europe, many passengers are being denied boarding by various international flight operators, causing them to lose ticket money. They are not being able to fly to their destinations in time.

articles.author: Mohammed Wajihuddin
articles.title: 22 'hafiz' from Malad-based madrassa clear SSC exam
articles.description: Abu Talha Ansari's joy knew no bounds when he secured 83.40 percent in SSC, results of which were announced on Friday. But there is another reason for him to be overjoyed. He has completed his 'hafiz' course (memorization of the Quran) too.

articles.author: Hemali Chhapia Shah
articles.title: Anytime learning finds takers, tutorials packed
articles.description: Coffee at 2am, paratha and juice for breakfast at 6am. This is the menu of a 24/7 canteen at a coaching academy. ATL or anytime-learning centres seem to be the need of the hour, like an idea borrowed from the online learning space and extended to the physical…

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: UP violence accused’s kin say no to aid to rebuild bulldozed home
articles.description: India News: PRAYAGRAJ: The family of Javed Mohammed alias Javed Pump, the alleged prime accused in the June 10 violence and arson in Prayagraj, has refused to acc.

articles.author: Namita Devidayal
articles.title: India Post gives voice to Kamathipura kids
articles.description: A thoughtful intervention will take a Mumbai child's imagination across the oceans into distant lands. India Post has just released a unique set of postcards made by the children of Kamathipura's commercial sex workers.

articles.author: Agencies
articles.title: India: Can’t be selective about religiophobia
articles.description: India News: There can’t be “double standards” on religiophobia and combating it should not be a “selective exercise” involving only one or two religions but also .

articles.title: PM Modi unfurls flag atop temple in Gujarat as dargah amicably shifted
articles.description: India News: AHMEDABAD: PM Narendra Modi on Saturday visited the Mahakali temple in Gujarat’s Panchmahal district and unfurled a flag on its spire which has been r.

articles.author: Mohammed Wajihuddin
articles.title: 22 ‘hafizs’ from Mumbai madrassa clear SSC exam
articles.description: The debate to modernise madrassa education is old one. Most madrassas are reluctant to introduce modern subjects like science and maths in their curricula. as they fear it will dilute the education of religious subjects.

articles.author: Namita Devidayal
articles.title: India Post gives voice to Kamathipura kids
articles.description: Each postcard carries a QR code which, when scanned, describes the child’s thoughts behind the painting, although it does not reveal the name of the child to protect his or her identity. For example, a picture featuring a woman’s face with a moustache, done b…

articles.author: Bharti Jain
articles.title: Notification allowing linking Aadhaar with voter ID issued
articles.description: The amended rules, which also make gender-neutral a provision that allowed only the wife of a male service voter to register as a voter in the same constituency as him, will take effect from August 1, 2022.

articles.author: Kalyan Das
articles.title: 15-year-old from business family rapes 5-star staffer
articles.description: As per police, the accused is from an affluent family in Chhattisgarh with interests in the construction business. The woman, who lives with her husband in Dehradun, said she was raped inside a washroom and later offered money by the boy’s father to “bury the…

articles.title: बुलडोजर में बैठकर दुल्हन लेने पहुंचा मुस्लिम दूल्हा, जानिए क्या बताई वजह
articles.description: बहराइच सदर सीट से भाजपा विधायक और पूर्व मंत्री अनुपमा जायसवाल ने मीडिया से कहा कि मुख्यमंत्री योगी जी का बुलडोजर सभी समुदायों के बीच सुशासन के प्रतीक के रूप में लोकप्रिय हो रहा है। उन्होंने कहा कि बुलडोजर सिर्फ अपराधियों के लिए ही भय का प्रतीक हो सकता है, शां…

articles.author: Akhilesh Kumar Singh
articles.title: Lok Sabha saw record productivity, attendance in past 3 years: Speaker Om Birla
articles.description: India News: On completing three years in office, Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla, in an exclusive interview with TOI’s Akhilesh Singh, spoke about House productivity, .

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Battered by floods again, Sai Layout residents fume
articles.description: Barely a month after they faced the fury of pre-monsoon showers, residents of Sri Sai Layout and Vaddarapalya on Hennur Main Road were yet again at the receiving end on Friday night when their areas were flooded with knee-deep water.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Karnataka: Former minister M Raghupathy no more
articles.description: Former minister M Raghupathy, who was education minister in the Ramakrishna Hegde-led government, passed away on Saturday after prolonged illness. He was 81.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: 61.9% pass II PU; toppers are from B’luru, V’nagara
articles.description: The results of the II PU exams announced on Saturday were not much different from two years ago, with a pass percentage of 61.9% (it was 61.8% in 2020). The exams were held from April 22 to May 18.

articles.author: TNN
articles.title: Heavy rain lashes B’luru for 2 hours, claims 3 lives
articles.description: Heavy rain across Bengaluru on Friday night killed three people, damaged over 75 vehicles and flooded many residential localities in eastern and northern areas of the city.

articles.author: Bharti Jain
articles.title: Y-category security for 10 Bihar BJP netas
articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: The Union home ministry on Saturday approved ‘Y’ category central security cover for 10 BJP leaders in Bihar, including deputy chief minist.
